channel.title: Heroku on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Heroku on Memo Tut

item.title: I want to publish a product at the lowest cost
item.description: Nice to meet you. It is Taro Man. I usually develop web services. -Siltrend #Introduction 彡(゜)(゜) “I want to make a service and publish it~” 彡(゜)(゜) “But, renting a rental server is a hassle**…” 彡(゜)(゜) “** Server fee ** I don’t want to pay…” Have you ever felt this way? There must be. Use the Heroku Free Plan for that. In this article, I will write about how to publish your application with Heroku’s free plan.

item.title: I made a music bot using discord.py and Google Drive API (tested with Docker → deployed on Heroku)
item.description: The used file is placed in [here](https://github.com/ysk0832/hobby/tree/master/discordbot-citron)(excludingauthenticationrelated) Basically, I made it for my family to enjoy. Thing you want to do Send a message on discord bot finds song file from google drive If you find it, download it and play it with your voice. Also, there are two personal requirements for music bots, You can request songs other than yourself I want to keep the bot running I decided to use google drive and heroku to satisfy these.

item.title: Knowledge base + Web API operated by NoSQL x PaaS
item.description: # What is this It is a summary of know-how when building a knowledge base + Web API with NoSQL and PaaS. When implementing an architecture called string tag oriented undirected graph type knowledge base, An example built with Heroku + Redis + FastAPI, Here is an example built with AWS(DynamoDB + Lambda + API Gateway). All the code parts use Python3.8.0. *Currently the AWS edition is incomplete. sorry.

item.title: Automate web processes with Heroku + Selenium + Chrome
item.description: # Automate web process with Heroku + Selenium + Chrome Automate web process with Heroku + Selenium + Chrome -Introduction -Purpose -Related Article -Execution environment -Source Code -Scenario and Assumptions -Create Automatic Process -Python API configuration -API mainframe -FX rate acquisition -Heroku Settings -Chrome and Driver Settings -[Driver version setting](#driver%e3%83%90%e3%83%bc%e3%82%b8%e3%83%a7%e3%83%b3%e3%81%ae%e8%a8(%ad%e5%ae%9a) Introduction This article is for Mac environment, but the procedure is the same for Windows environment. Please read the environment-dependent part and try again.

item.title: I made a Web application that graphs the life log recorded by Google Home like a Gantt chart.
item.description: ## I made a web application that graphs life logs like a Gantt chart _ People people people people people people people people _ LIFE LOG GRAPH GENERATOR < ￣ Y^Y^Y^Y^Y^Y^Y^Y^Y^Y^Y^Y￣ A brief description From the life log data in which the `date` and `content` are described. ． ． (Folded.) October 15, 2019 at 11:24PM Go to bed October 16, 2019 at 06:03AM Wake up October 16, 2019 at 07:08AM Outing October 16, 2019 at 08:17AM Start development October 16, 2019 at 10:49AM Development finished October 16, 2019 at 12:30PM Return home October 16, 2019 at 12:59PM Start reading October 16, 2019 at 04:32PM Finish reading October 16, 2019 at 10:31PM Go to bed October 17, 2019 at 06:46AM Wake up October 17, 2019 at 07:29AM Going out October 17, 2019 at 08:27AM Start development October 17, 2019 at 12:48PM Development ended October 17, 2019 at 01:48PM Return home October 17, 2019 at 02:35PM TV started October 17, 2019 at 04:54PM TV ends A web application that creates such an interactive graph.
